name: Fiduciary bonds, expense
text: §431:10F-102  Fiduciary bonds, expense.  Any fiduciary required by law to give bonds, may include, as part of the fiduciary's lawful expense to be allowed by the court or official by whom the fiduciary was appointed, the reasonable amount paid as premium for the bonds to the surety insurer who issued or guaranteed the bonds. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
